title: Poster presentation at the ISRE 2015 Conference
body: A poster about the DEW has been presented during the conference organized by the Internation Society for Research on Emotion, held in Geneva in July 2015.
label: Download the Hands-out

title: Domain registration
body: Registration of the domain www.dynamicemotionwheel.ch for the current site.

title: Google group as a Forum
body: The Google group is to be used as support and discussion forum.
label: Visit the Forum

title: Poster for NCCR "Affective Sciences" Annual Research Forum 2016
body: Simple poster that resumes the main information already available in this site, presented at the Annual Research Forum of the Swiss National Center of Competence in Research "Affective Sciences"
label: Download the poster
